msIdentifier.institution: Śrī Sāgara Gacchano Jaina Jñānabhaṃdāra collection,

msDesc.p: Śrī Hemacandrācārya Jainajñānamandira, Pāṭan, Śrī Sāgara Gacchano Jaina Jñānabhaṃdāra collection, MS no. 8930. MS described in Puṇyavijayajī (1972: 329–435). Address for correspondence: Mayur Shah, 10 Bharati Society, Patan 384265, India. Ff. 1v–21v, 20 lines/page, 60 akṣaras/line of Devanāgarī. Missing ff. 4–9. I.e., with the missing ff. (4–9) it would have been approximately 1538 granthas in length. F. 1v has the marginal note in roman script: “Some where the folios are very dull in Prata and folio no. 4–9 are missing in original Prata."

body.p:
1 SOME Where the folios are very dull in Prata and folio No.-4 to 9 are Contact: Mayur Shah, 10 Bharati Society, Patan, 384265 INDIA missing in original Prata §O|| oṃ namo raseṃdrāya gurubhyo namaḥ||
natvā raseṃdraṃ śivasaukhyakārakaṃ| apārasaṃsārasamudratārakaṃ|
sarvārthasiddhipradamukhyamaṃgalaṃ| graṃthaṃ pravakṣyāmi raseṃdramaṃgalaṃ|| 1||
raseṃdramaṃgalaṃ śrutvā| yaś cikitsec cikitsakaḥ|
tasya siddhir na saṃdeho| svayaṃ nāgārjjuno 'bravīt|| 2||
rasoparasalohānāṃ ra|sādau śodhanaṃ tathā|
vajrādau māraṇaṃ vakṣye| drāvaṇaṃ sarvadhātuṣu|| 3||
tṛtīye rasasaṃbaṃdhaṃ| caturthe guṭikāvidhiḥ
vātādau sarvarogeṣu| cikitsā paṃcamo mataḥ||4||
cittagaṃdhakayuktyādi| aṃjanaṃ ṣaṣṭham eva ca
saptame viṣataṃtraṃ tu| aṣṭame guṇasaṃjñakaṃ||5||
aṣṭādhyāyam iti proktaṃ| śāstre smin rasamaṃgale|
tatrādau maṃgalaṃ kṛtvā| maṃgalaṃ maṃgalāyate||6||
aṇimādyaṣṭavibhūtido ghanaṃ| saṃsārapārapāradaḥ||
muktvaikaṃ rasarājaṃ ca| bhūtale ko'nyosti jarāpaho paraḥ
baddhaḥ khecaratāṃ padaṃ naye travyādhisamūhamūrchitaḥ|
jārito janmajarāvināśato| kramito raṃjito bhuktimuktidaḥ yadi paṃcatvagataṃ dvisūtakaṃ| aśitaḥ syād amaratvakārakaḥ||8
jalūkākāranibaddhasarūpadāyakṛtvā sākāranirākāratāgataṃ hi sūtakaṃ || 9||
aśitaṃ syād amaratvakārakaḥ|| bhūcarabhūtasiddhidaṃ| pārāvāram apārapāradaṃ| tasmāt kaḥ karuṇāparo paraḥ||10||
brahmamūrttir+abaddhaś+ca| baddhś+cātha janārdanaḥ| raṃjitaḥ krāmita?taḥ sākṣāt pratyakṣam īśvaraḥ||11||
tasmāt+sevaya bhūpāla| rasarājaṃ mahītale| nirujatvaṃ mahīśatvaṃ| yadīchet siddhim ātmanaḥ||12||
śatāśvamedhaḥ kurute na puṇyaṃ| gokoṭidānena gajeṃdrakoṭibhiḥ| suvarṇabhūdānasamānadharme| nṛṇāṃ labhet sūtakadarśanena||13||
yat sarvatīrtheṣu kṛtābhiṣekaḥ| puṇyair+avāpyas+tridaśeṃdranāthaḥ| yadaṣṭaniṣṭhaṃ labhate manuṣyaḥ| sākṣād rasasparśanadarśanena||14||
kāruṇyapuṃjaṃ haram īśarūpaṃ| sākṣād raseṃdraṃ prathitāḥ pṛthivyāṃ| ye vai na jānāti raseṃdrakarma| tasya pṛthivyāṃ sa kathaṃ hi vaidyaḥ||15||
kiṃ va?pa?r varayogaratnai|r na yāti tulyaṃ naranātha bhūtale| raseṃdrayogād dharakoṭiraṃśitaḥ| tasmāt prayatnena raseṃdra sevyaḥ||16|| iti rasapraśaṃsā
malaṃ viṣaṃ vahnigurutvacāpalaṃ| naisagikā doṣam+uśaṃti tajñā| utpāditau dvau trapunāgasaṃbhavau| raseṃdrarājo kathayaṃti vaidyāḥ||17||
malena mūrchā śikhinā ca dāhaṃ| viṣeṇa mṛtyuḥ pravadaṃti sāṃtaḥ| gurutvadoṣeṇa karoti śūlaṃ| ma tiṣṭhate tac capalatvadoṣāt||18||
kākasya pichasya samarūpajharī| tāreṇa hemnā milati kṣaṇena| āvarttito yo kṣayatāṃ na yāti| taṃ baṃdhasū|taṃ pravadaṃti tadjñāḥ||19||
yo nāgavaṃgau prabalau ca doṣau| syāt sūtarājo galadaṃḍagulmān| abaddhamūlaṃ nihataṃ pramādāt| karoti kuṣṭhaṃ prabalaṃ raseṃdraḥ||21||
tasmād ādau vasaṃproktā| karmāṇy+aṣṭādaśāni ca| purācāryau raseṃdrasya| jñātavyoktaprayatnataḥ||22||
nāgabalātibalā varṣā|bhūme?viṣāṇi yutaṃ| ghananādaṃ ebhir mathitair navasāraṃ sedanadam idaṃ tridinaṃ rasarāje||23||
rasachedanamardanamūrchanaṃ ca| uchāpanaṃ pātanadīpanaṃ ca|nivāsanaṃ vāruṇaruṃdhanaṃ ca|baṃdhadrutīnāṃ varagarbhamāraṇaṃ||24||
grāsapramāṇaṃ vidhiraṃjanaṃ ca| saṃsāraṇaṃ krāmaṇavedhayogaṃ| na vaitti yo vai vapuṃṣi
prayuṃjanaṃ|raseṃdrarājaḥ prakaroti nāśaṃ||25||
ghanatvasāṃdratvacapalatvasāṃdramuktaḥ|śvetatvaśītatvakharatvamuktaḥ||malādikadvādaśadoṣamuktaḥ|śrīsūtarājastumṛtatvayuktaḥ||26||
tasmāt sūtavidā sārdhaṃ|sahāyair+nipuṇair+yutaḥ| sarvopaskaram+ādāya|rasakarma samācaret||27||
lelīnakaṃsanagaraṃ|śilājarusamanvitaṃ|dhyānasyāgni sahakṣiptaṃ|sa sūtaḥ sarvakarmasu||28||
dve sahasre palānāṃ tu|sahaśraṃ śatam+eva ca|aṣṭāviṃśatipalāny+eva|daśapaṃcakam+eva ca||29||
palārddhe na ca saṃskāraḥ|karttavyaḥ sūtakasya ca||sudine subhanakṣatre|rasaśodhanam ārabhet||30||
phalachikaṃ citrakaraktasarṣapāḥ||kumārikānyā bṛhatīkakhāya||vimardya sūtaṃ tridināni yāvat|vimucyate paṃcamalādidoṣaiḥ||31||
saptavārānamadhamūrdvapātayet|mlechamiśritaraseṃdrapiṭhikāṃ|muṃcatebhyaguridoṣasūtakaṃ|nāgavaṃgagurutāpi cāpalaṃ||32||
nāgabalātibalaṃ varṣābhūmipaviṣāṇiyutaghanatorda||ebhir+mathitair+navasāraṃ|śvedanamṛdutridinaṃ rasarāje||33||
rasasya ṣoḍaśāṃśena|ūṣaṇaṃ ṣaṭrājikā|ūrdvasaṃkhyātrayaṃ caiva|āranālaṁ samānayet||34||
sarvadhānyāmlasaṃdhānaṃ tuṣavarjaṃ tu kārayet| tatas tatraiva saṃdhānaṃ|nikṣiped auṣadhairimaiḥ||35||
girikarṇā ca mīnākṣī|savadervapunar na vā| urugātriphalākrāṃtā|laghupaṇīśatāvarī|tanuyuktaṃ rasaṃ kṣinnaṃ|tridinaṃ mṛduvahninā|| dolāyaṃtreṇa tīvreṇa|mardayitvā pu???||37||
ūrṇāharidrā?ṭuriṣṭakāmlaiḥ|samāranāler+ gṛhadhūmamiśrai| siddhārtharājī tridināni khalve| saṃmardanaṃ sūtam+ uśaṃti saṃtaḥ||38||
iti mardanaṃ||??rā?ikāka?yakākamācikā|mekhaśṛṃgirasakala???||āranālasahitaṃ sutāpitaṃ|saptavārarasarājamūrchanaṃ||39||
kaṃcukī garuḍi vā vārāhikā|naṃdinī śvaribalā ca śūlinī| sarpavallirasarājamarditaṃ|mūrchati bhramati paṃcatāṃ nayet||40||
ity+ uchāpanaṃ pātanaṃ pūrvavat|adho rddhe yaṃtravidhinā pātayitvā niyojayat| kṣādrāmlalavaṇakṣāra|āranālena saṃyutāṃ|dīpayet+trīṇi vārāṇi|āhārārthaṃ tu sūtakaṃ||41||
sṛṣṭyāṃbujai yuto rodho|agninā sūtakasya ca||41||
rodhnaṃ karkoṭī kaṃcukīyogāt|yojayen nirayāmake||nirmalas+tejasā sūto|jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ||42||iti niyāmakaḥ
kīratuṃḍī garuḍī vichaṃdā|kanyakā kumārikā ca vāyasī| āsurī jayā ca vijayā ca|vahnidīpanakarā ca sūtake||43||
suvarṇaṃ rajatasparśā| sarvadhātuṣu niścitaṃ|kurute līlayā sūtaḥ| koṭivedhī smitaḥ sadā||44||
kim+atra citraṃ rasakaṃ rasena|rajasvalāyāḥ kusumena bhāvitaṃ|krameṇa kṛtvā turugaṃ na raṃjitaṃ||karoti śulvaṃ tripuṭe na kāṃcanaṃ| iti rasakaśodhanaṃ|
kim+atra citraṃ daradaṃ bhusāvitaṃ| payena mīdhī bahuśo+mlavarggeḥ|sitasuvarṇaṃ bahudharmatāpitaṃ| karoti sākṣād+varakuṃkumaprabhaṃ||46|| iti daradaśuddhiḥ
kulatthako dravakvātha|naramūtreṇa pācayet|vitasāyāmlavargeṇa|datvā kṣārapuṭatrayaṃ||47||
kim+atra citraṃ kadalīrasena| supācitaṃ sūraṇakaṃdasaṃs?aṃ| vātāritaile na ghṛtena tāpyaṃ|puṭena dagdhaṃ varaśuddhim+eti||48||
munikusumarasasubhāvitaṃ|manaḥśilāvārān saptaśudhyeti|kūṣmāṃḍarasena tāpyaṃ|śudhyati sākṣādinaikena pākṣikaśodhanaṃ|punaḥ kūṣmāṃḍena tālaśodhanaṃ| iti mahārasaśuddhiḥ||49||
tāraiḥ snehair+ādau paścā|d+amlena bhāvitaṃ bahuśaḥ| śudhyaṃti rasoparasān|parān+api dhātavaḥ sarvān||50||iti dhātuśuddhiḥ
kaṃdūlikāghanaravaḥ karavīrakīra|jaṃbīranīrakapavetasamāranāliḥ|raktotpalai kuṣaviśāśini|
syāha tailaiḥ| saṃpātito+pi gaganaṃ rasarūpiṇansyāt||51||
saptarātreṇābhrakaśuddhiḥ|śyāmā śamī madanako dravam+āśukarṇī|śṛṇgī ghaṭodbhavaghanadhvanivetasaś+ca|kvāthaṃ kulatthajadhananīrajabīrasūraṇaṃ|saṃpācito+pi tridinaiḥ paraśuddhim+ eti||52||
ghananīraṃ punarnavāsūraṇaṃ vakṣaśodhanaṃ|vaikrāṃtasaptapācitam+amlamūtraiḥ| tārais+tathāṣaṭvasāgaraghane hi miśraiḥ| kvāthe na ko dravakulatthasamudrave na| saṃśveditā tridinam+āśu bhavaṃti śuddhāḥ||53||
iti vaikrāṃahārāśuddhiḥ dvividhā vimalā pācyā| raṃbhātoyena saṃyutā| lavaṇena vakṣadugdhena| tāmrapatrāṇi lepayet||54||
agnau saṃtāpya nirguṃḍī| rase siktaṃ ca saptadhā| mārkvavarase naiva śulbaśuddhir+bhaviṣyati||55||
capalādyā dhātavaḥ sarvā| jaṃbīrarasabhāvitā| śodhitā tridinaṃ paṃcamṛttikābhūmibhasmataḥ| lavaṇena yutaś+ceva|śodhayet paṭu kāṃcanaṃ| hemaśodhanaṃ| nāgena kṣārarājena| drāvaṃti śuddhim iccheti| tāras+trivāraṃ saṃkṣipto| piśācī tailamadhyagaḥ| iti tāraśodhanaṃ||57||
ahobhacitraṃ pṛthivī bhaṭena|kṣāreṇa me?|payasā ghṛtena| tālena vidvaghṛtaṣoḍaśāṃśaṃ|bhavec+ca śuddhaṃ śaśiśaṃkhasaṃnibhaṃ||58||
ayaḥprakāśo dhṛtaṃ śuddhaṃ|mā jñeyaṃ dhāmayedudhaḥ|ṣaṭguṇena ca nāgena śodhayitvā tato budhaḥ| itiśulvaśodhanaṃ||59||
śuddhaṃ śulvasya patraṃ dviguṇitarajasā gaṃdhakasyāpaliptaṃ| dagdhasaṃpuṭaskaṃ punar+api vipacet svarkadugdha vimardya vārān saptabhir+hatvā kṛtam+amalam+idaṃ vāṃtidoṣair+vimuktaṃ| proktaṃ ?vekti ataḥ kramavidhiviṣayayogibhir yogya???||60||
kṣāraṃ guḍaṃ ca haṃsapadaṃ ca lākṣā| rasena ghṛṣṭvā|radalāni paścāt|salepyakam tūṣṭhaniśānvitā ca śudvān viśuvyati saptavārān||61||
āraśodhanaṃ| vāraṃ saṭaṃkaṇayutaṃ lavaṇāni yeca| jaṃbīranīraparitāpitasaptavārān| kalkena tena paritapya puṭena dagdhā| tārāṇi śulva?naghoṣam+upaiti śuddhiḥ||62|| iti ghoṣaśodhanaṃ
haṃsāṃdrivalyāmṛtaratnamālikā| phalatrayaṃ taṃtvarulohanignaḥ|gopālikā goragranāgarūrūcī|haraṃti sarve giridoṣam āyasāt||63||
tīkṣṇaśodhanaṃ|gīrīphalāni rajanīkṣurasaḥ kubera|bījāni tuṃbarayutāni ca mallikāyāḥ|kṣārāṇi mokṣakaphalāśamahārajāni| saṃbhāvitāni payasa?liśadrumasya||64||
vārāṇi sapta paritāpitanāgarājaṃ|kalkena śuddhim+eti sadyaḥ| yuktyā krameṇa pradiśaktapaye na durlloṃstaṃtaṃ karoti kuṭilasya vadaṃti saṃ???nāgaśodhanaṃ| arkonmattas+tu hipayahalinī kuṃcakī na kramamālā| guṃjā vahniḥ surapatiḥ surā viśveṃgudīśvagaṃdhā|takrepiṣṭaṃ malaharatimidaṃ sarvalokaprasiddhaṃ vaṃgastaṃbhaṃ kṣaṇam+api kurute jyotiṣo nāmayogaḥ||65||
vaṃgaśodhanaṃ agastipuṣpaniryāso bhāvitā ca manaḥśilā| taccūrṇaṃ vihite gedhe praticāpāya nikṣipet||
iti nāgārjunaviracite raseṃdramaṃgale rasoparasalohaśodhanādhikāraḥ prathamaḥ

athāto vajrādau lohamāraṇadhānyādhikāra vyākhyāsyāmaḥ|
meṣaśṛṃgī bhujaṃgo sthi|kūrmapṛṣṭhaṃ śilājinu|stuhīlālārajaḥ śūnya|kāṃtapāṣāṇam eva ca||1||
vajrakaṃ vāpi vaikrāṃtaṃ|tanmadhye prakṣiped+budhaḥ| tīvrānalaiḥ puṣṭaṃ dalā|puṭāṃ taṃyāvadāgataṃ||2||
kulasthako dravānāṃ tu| hayamūtreṇa pīṣayet| taptaṃ niṣevayet+kalke| yāvat+tau bhaśmatāṃ gatau| eṣaḥ kapāliko yoga|vajramāraṇam+uttamaṃ||3||
tāpyaṃ tāmraṃ ahitīkṣṇa| kāṃtā smaśravaṇāṃbunaṃ|vajrārkaṣīrasobhāgyaṃ| mardayec+ca punaḥpunaḥ||4||
tanmadhye nikṣiped+vajraṃ|dhamayec+ca khadirāgninā| śatavāraṃ tato dhmātaṃ| vajramāraṇaraṃjanaṃ||5||
pītamahodadhikuṣṭa|mamlāditavālādiśṛṃganiryāsaṃ|saṃgo rasanā guṭikā vajraṃ| puṭapākato haṃti||6||
kāṃtā smameṣa śṛṃge ca| gaṃdhakaṃ ca śilājitu| kṣāratra|yaṃ|hariṃ tālaṃ stumparkakṣīramarditaṃ||7||
vajrakaṃthāpi vaikrāṃtaṃ| tanmadhye prakṣiped+budhaḥ| tīvratālapuṭaṃ datvā| puṭāṃtaṃ yāvad+āgataṃ||8||
kulandhako dravānāṃ tu| hayamūtreṇa pīṣayet| taptaṃ niṣecayet+kalke| yāvato bhaśmatāṃ gatau| yogo+yaṃ vajrako nāma| vajradrāvaṇam+uttamaṃ| meṣaśṛṃgī vajravallī| mahodadhiṃ pārāpatīviṣṭād+upāyaṃ ca|purīṣmaṣu samanvitaṃ||10||
kṣāratraya tuṣyakṣāraiś+ca paṃcabhiḥ| vajrārkakṣīrasaṃmiśraṃ| kalkaṃ saṃpīṣayed+budhaḥ| vajra 0 gatau 0 vāruṇyādimato yoga| vajra?? 1 ṇam+uttamaṃ| kīlālamāṣuviruṃdha| meṣaśṛṃgī ghaṭodbhavaḥ||15|| kulatthako 0 vajrakaṃ vā ?vikrāṃtaṃ| puṭapākena mārayet| yogarājam+idaṃ proktaṃ| māraṇaṃ gamanasya ca| drāvaṇaṃ sarvadhātūnāṃ| kurute nātra saṃśayaḥ| asthiśṛṃkhalamadhyasthaṃ| kṛtvā vajraniruṃdhitaṃ| jalabhāṃḍena saṃkṣinnaṃ| saptāhadrāvatāṃ nayet|| iti vajravikrāṃtamāraṇaṃ
cūrṇīkṛtaṃ gaganapatrasamāranālaṃ| dhṛtvā dinaikam+atha śoṣpacasūraṇasthaṃ| bhāvyaṃ rasaiḥ kadaliśṛṃgikarīrakīra| raṃbīranīraghaṭajais+tu puṭaiḥ sametaṃ||18||
piṃḍīkṛtaṃ tu va?śo malena| saṃśodhya koṣṭhagatam+āśu dhamet evāgnau| satvaṃ pataṃti gaganasya caturvidhasya| tāsīruhasya bahuśo sya?dhātavasya||19|| phalatrayaṃ vahnibalābalābhra|bhrūvalli
